## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                        | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ---------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `href`       | `href`        | The link href.                     | `string`  | `'#'`       |
| `isExternal` | `is-external` | Whether internal or external link. | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `text`       | `text`        | The link label.                    | `string`  | `undefined` |
